content:
**Which graph shows an exponential function with a domain of all real values of $x$?**


[[â˜ƒ radio 1]]

choices.content: ![An exponential function is graphed. The x and h of x axes go from negative 10 to 10. The curve has arrows at the edge of the graph on either end.](web+graphie://ka-perseus-graphie.s3.amazonaws.com/58eba3557f395a5808e1465586bcbfb01b387b04)

![A ray of an exponential function is graphed. The x and h of x axes go from negative 10 to 10. The curve has an arrow at the right edge and ends on the left side in an open, unfilled circle at (negative 6, 8).](web+graphie://ka-perseus-graphie.s3.amazonaws.com/919f6bbed9a4ac4eb579579860bdc82b0a4eebbf)

![A ray of an exponential function is graphed. The x and h of x axes go from negative 10 to 10. The curve has an arrow at the left edge and ends on the right side in an open, unfilled circle at (8, 0 point 2).](web+graphie://ka-perseus-graphie.s3.amazonaws.com/d0ccbf359ebf548001065c67336d0f14b9a71d62)

![A segment of an exponential function is graphed. The x and h of x axes go from negative 10 to 10. The curve ends on the left side in an open, unfilled circle at (negative 6, 8) and ends on the right side in an open, unfilled circle at (8, 0 point 2).](web+graphie://ka-perseus-graphie.s3.amazonaws.com/45c1908a390bef289064182b046d113adbe6831b)
